metadata.title: CVE-2023-2603 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
A vulnerability was found in libcap. This issue occurs in the _libcap_strdup() function and can lead to an integer overflow if the input string is close to 4GiB.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-2603` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libcap2 - 1:2.44-1ubuntu0.22.10.1
libcap2-bin - 1:2.44-1ubuntu0.22.10.1
libpam-cap - 1:2.44-1ubuntu0.22.10.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libcap2 package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2.44-1ubuntu0.22.10.1').
